content.user_title: Monitor and Optimize UniFi WiFi Networks
content.value_statement: Managing WiFi networks requires constant monitoring of multiple access points, client devices, and channel configurations. This skill provides unified access to UniFi network data, enabling quick analysis and optimization recommendations without switching between management interfaces.
actual_capabilities: List all WiFi networks with security and status details
Track connected client devices and signal strength metrics
Analyze channel usage and identify interference patterns
Monitor access point performance and load distribution
Review band distribution between 2.4GHz and 5GHz networks
Generate optimization recommendations for WiFi infrastructure
limitations: Requires UniFi Network API access credentials
Cannot modify network configuration, read-only access only
Performance depends on UniFi controller responsiveness
Does not support non-UniFi network hardware

best_practices: Monitor band distribution regularly to ensure balanced client load across 2.4GHz and 5GHz frequencies.
Track signal strength trends over time to identify coverage gaps before users report connectivity issues.
Review channel utilization weekly to optimize access point placement and reduce interference from neighboring networks.
anti_patterns: Ignoring clients with consistently poor signal strength instead of investigating root causes.
Making channel changes without reviewing historical utilization data and neighbor network activity.
Allowing all devices to connect to 2.4GHz without band steering, causing congestion on the crowded frequency.

faq.question: What UniFi devices are supported?
faq.answer: Works with UniFi Network installations using UniFi Controller 6.x or later with API access enabled.

faq.question: How many access points can this skill monitor?
faq.answer: The skill can monitor all access points configured in your UniFi controller without specific limits.

faq.question: Does this skill modify network settings?
faq.answer: No. This skill provides read-only access to network data for monitoring and analysis purposes only.

faq.question: Is my network data sent anywhere?
faq.answer: All data stays within your environment. The skill only queries your UniFi API locally or through your controller.

faq.question: Why are some client statistics unavailable?
faq.answer: Clients must have recent network activity to appear in statistics. Dormant clients may show limited metrics.

faq.question: How does this compare to the UniFi mobile app?
faq.answer: This skill provides programmatic access for automated monitoring and faster troubleshooting workflows in AI conversations.
